The comparison/less_equal.hpp header defines macros that compare for equality or lesser magnitude.

Usage

#include <boost/preprocessor/comparison/less_equal.hpp>

Contents

  • BOOST_PP_LESS_EQUAL
  • BOOST_PP_LESS_EQUAL_D
